{"foo":2}
----
application/datalog
key{id: 0, span: span{from: 1, to: 6}, text: "\"foo\""}
number{id: 1, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}, text: "2"}
value{id: 2, number: 1, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}}
keyValue{id: 3, key: 0, span: span{from: 1, to: 8}, value: 2}
object{id: 4, keyValue: 3, span: span{from: 0, to: 9}}
value{id: 5, object: 4, span: span{from: 0, to: 9}}

{"foo":2,"bar":3}
----
application/datalog
key{id: 0, span: span{from: 1, to: 6}, text: "\"foo\""}
number{id: 1, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}, text: "2"}
value{id: 2, number: 1, span: span{from: 7, to: 8}}
keyValue{id: 3, key: 0, span: span{from: 1, to: 8}, value: 2}
key{id: 4, span: span{from: 9, to: 14}, text: "\"bar\""}
number{id: 5, span: span{from: 15, to: 16}, text: "3"}
value{id: 6, number: 5, span: span{from: 15, to: 16}}
keyValue{id: 7, key: 4, span: span{from: 9, to: 16}, value: 6}
object{id: 8, keyValue: 7, span: span{from: 0, to: 17}}
value{id: 9, object: 8, span: span{from: 0, to: 17}}
